title: What Makes SPC Flooring an Exciting New Product?
desc: Sometimes you’ll see “SPC” stand for stone plastic composite, meaning it uses a combination of limestone and stabilizers so you get a rock-solid flooring different from other vinyl options.

title: The most common vinyl you’ve probably heard about is WPC
desc: Standing for wooden plastic composite. These floors have become a bestseller worldwide, though SPC is now making major gains.

title: While SPC costs a little more
desc: It’s certainly far from expensive. Its extra durability aspect is very important for homes and businesses needing extra protection. One of the standout features is better waterproofness.
